name: ProMax Running Shoes
description: High-performance running shoes designed for comfort and durability. Features a breathable mesh upper and responsive cushioning.

name: UltraFlex Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning for maximum comfort. Ideal for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises.

name: PowerLift Dumbbell Set
description: Adjustable dumbbell set with a range of weights from 5 to 50 lbs. Perfect for home workouts and strength training.

name: SwiftStrike Tennis Racket
description: Lightweight and durable tennis racket designed for precision and power. Suitable for players of all skill levels.

name: HydroBoost Water Bottle
description: Insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours. Made from BPA-free stainless steel.

name: TrailBlazer Hiking Backpack
description: Rugged hiking backpack with multiple compartments and hydration system compatibility. Designed for long treks and outdoor adventures.

name: ProGear Soccer Ball
description: Official size and weight soccer ball with enhanced grip and durability. Ideal for both practice and competitive play.

name: FlexFit Athletic Wear Set
description: Comfortable and moisture-wicking athletic wear set including a t-shirt and shorts. Perfect for workouts and casual wear.

name: CoreBalance Stability Ball
description: Stability ball for core strengthening exercises and improved balance. Comes with an air pump for easy inflation.

name: SpeedMaster Running Watch
description: GPS-enabled running watch with heart rate monitoring and fitness tracking features. Water-resistant and lightweight design.
